extends greenfoot.Actor

Class for individual tiles of the map

Method Summary
 int getMovementX(int checkpoint)
          Returns the movement in the x direction of this tile
The paramater is which checkpoint the mob has passed already
 int getMovementY(int checkpoint)
          Returns the movement in the y direction of this tile
The paramater is which checkpoint the mob has passed already
 boolean getPlaceable()
          returns true if you can place a tower on this tile
 boolean getWalkable()
          Returns whether this tile is abled to walked over
 int getX()
          Returns the x coordinate of the tile
 int getY()
          Returns the y coordinate of the tile
 void reset()
          resets the tile back to the inital settings
 void setId(int i)
          sets the color of the tile
 void setId(int i, boolean special)
          only called for the special tiles start, checkpoint, and end
 void setMovement(boolean End)
          sets the vector movement for the end tile will be called for only the end tile
 void setMovement(int x, int y, int checkpoint)
          sets the vector movement of this tile
 void setPlaceable(boolean b)
          sets if you can place a tower on this tile
 void setWalkable(boolean w)
          Sets true or false on whether this tile is able to be walked over
